question: Who among the following is the creator of Zero-Based-Budgeting?
explanation: Peter A. Phyrr is the creater of Zero-BasedBudgeting. Zero Based-Budgeting (ZBB) is a tool that was invented in the 1970s by Texas Instrumentsâ€™ Peter Phyrr, as a way to develop and control a more austere and effective budgeting system.
